word: DETAILED AUTOBIOGRAPHICAL ACCOUNTS AS PUBLISHED IN 1860 AND 1885 PRESENT THAT WHICH APPEARS HERE AS TWO DISTINCT VISIONS. SEE "MY FIRST VISION" IN SPIRITUAL GIFTS, VOL. 2, PP. 30-35; TESTIMONIES, VOL. 1, PP. 58-61; AND "VISION OF THE NEW EARTH," IN SPIRITUAL GIFTS, VOL. 2, PP. 52-55; TESTIMONIES, VOL. 1, PP.
